Hi, I’m Caleb.

Business Intelligence Developer, Data Analyst, Process Engineer

I’m an analytics-driven problem solver building a second career in business intelligence after a 10-year tenure as a manufacturing process engineer. I am passionate about building consensus with data, inside and outside of the workplace.
